name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms
description: The maximum delay (unit is ms) before retrying locateFollowingBlock.

name: ipc.client.connect.retry.interval
description:
Indicates the number of milliseconds a client will wait for
    before retrying to establish a server connection.

name: mapreduce.job.max.split.locations
description:
The max number of block locations to store for each split for
    locality calculation.

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.warn.after.ms
description:
If looking up a single user to group takes longer than this amount of
    milliseconds, we will log a warning message.

name: dfs.client.socket-timeout
description: Default timeout value in milliseconds for all sockets.
